quotes.quote: The place was silent and aware.
There are no walls in the atmosphere.
Those who are finer and nobler are always alone and necessarily so and that because of this they can enjoy the purity of their own atmosphere.
Rain hangs about the place, like a friendly ghost. if it's not coming down in delicate droplets, then it's in buckets; and if neither, it tends to lurk suspiciously in the atmosphere.
In comedy it helps if there's a friendly atmosphere on the set.
The atmosphere defines the environment of sound.
The atmosphere was wide open in those circles that we traveled in.
Cheerfulness is the atmosphere in which all things thrive.
The sounds I had heard seemed worthy to mingle with this bright and perfumed atmosphere, and to thrill the beautiful scenery around me.
I know: If you're looking down at Earth, you're looking through an atmosphere that has a bit of haze in many places and not just occasional clouds.
A restaurant on the moon could not have had less atmosphere.
A sort of war of revenge on the intellect is what, for some reason, thrives in the contemporary social atmosphere.
Human beings, like plants, grow in the soil of acceptance, not in the atmosphere of rejection.
Our emotions affect the atmosphere around us, and other people, because emotions influence the electromagnetic field our heart emits.
I believe your atmosphere and your surroundings create a mind state for you.
I would have had the same narrative, regardless of the atmosphere and the restrictions.
If you fill the atmosphere with toxins, then you really cannot be surprised if the solar radiation transmission through it becomes toxic to humans.
Especially when you play at home, you need a good atmosphere behind you.
The atmosphere of orthodoxy is always damaging to prose, and above all it is completely ruinous to the novel, the most anarchical of all forms of literature.
Without atmosphere a painting is nothing.
Before a secret is told, one can often feel the weight of it in the atmosphere.
The icy layers of the upper atmosphere contain conundrums enough to be worthy of humanity's greatest efforts.
Love is a portion of the soul itself, and it is of the same nature as the celestial breathing of the atmosphere of paradise.
I think it is important that we rebuild an atmosphere of forgiveness and civility in every aspect of our lives.
To carry the atmosphere of God's Glory is to extend it to the whole earth.
There are certain romances that belong in certain cities, in a certain atmosphere, in a certain time.
When yellow lights struggle with blue shades in hairlike lines.
A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
It is better to have your head in the clouds, and know where you are. Than to breathe the clearer atmosphere below them, and think that you are in paradise.
States of the atmosphere pass into us as water through the meshes of a sieve, and storms occur in us before they break upon the world without, creating restless sensations.
I have to go someplace where I can soak myself in a creative atmosphere.
The very atmosphere of firearms anywhere and everywhere restrains evil interference they deserve a place of honor with all that's good.
Expectancy is the atmosphere for miracles.
An atmosphere of happiness is the atmosphere of the Kingdom of God.
What a splendid thing watercolor is to express atmosphere and distance, so that the figure is surrounded by air and can breathe in it.
The conscience of children is formed by the influences that surround them; their notions of good and evil are the result of the moral atmosphere they breathe.
Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.
Looking through the atmosphere is somewhat like looking through a piece of old, stained glass. The glass has defects in it, so the image is blurred from that.
Behave so the aroma of your actions may enhance the general sweetness of the atmosphere.
A woman should be home with the children, building that home and making sure there's a secure family atmosphere.
In a gallery, there's an expectation of high prices and a somewhat elitist atmosphere.
One of the most ephemeral and important things is atmosphere and tone and it's very hard to put your finger on what creates that.
Every deed and every relationship is surrounded by an atmosphere of silence. Friendship needs no words, it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.
